name: NHToolKit
summary: A set of tools to make iOS development easier.
description:
Here is the list of classes included:

                    - NHKeychainHelper
                    - NHSeparatorsView
                    - NHSlideshowImagesView
                    - NSString+Validation
                    - UIButton+HitTarget
                    - UICollectionReusableView+Convenience
                    - UICollectionViewCell+Convenience
                    - UIColor+Photoshop
                    - UIKit+Bold
                    - UIViewController+Hierarchy
